title: French exchange
authors: Richard Davies, Finn McEvoy, Josh Hellings
subtitle: The old rivals of Europe have a new economic deal. From cooperation on jet engines to a spat over sea snails, who does best out of Anglo-French trade?
intro: Britain’s relations with France have shifted in recent weeks. A new economic deal with the EU was struck—one with a distinctly French flavour. Yet just a few days later the French navy impounded a British ship. It is the latest chapter in a turbulent history - one of partnership and rivalry. How do the two economies compare in 2025? What are the gains f…
